npc.WhatDoYou: What do you want to do?

tutorial.Arrows: Use {cbabypink}mouse{cwhite} or {cbabypink}arrows{cwhite} (or {cbabypink}WASD{cwhite} if enabled) to {cbabyblue}navigate{cwhite} the around field or menu options. Hold {cbabypink}[Shift]{cwhite} to walk {cbabyblue}faster{cwhite}.
tutorial.Z: Use {cbabypink}[Z]{cwhite}, {cbabypink}[Enter]{cwhite} or the {cbabypink}left mouse button{cwhite} to {cbabyblue}interact{cwhite} with an NPC or {cbabyblue}select{cwhite} an option in a menu.
tutorial.X: Use {cbabypink}[X]{cwhite}, {cbabypink}[Backspace]{cwhite} or the {cbabypink}right mouse button{cwhite} to {cbabyblue}return{cwhite}/close a menu window or open the {cbabyblue}main menu{cwhite} when navigating the field.
tutorial.Page: Press {cbabypink}[N]{cwhite}/{cbabypink}[M]{cwhite} or {cbabypink}[Page Up]{cwhite}/{cbabypink}[Page Down]{cwhite} to {cbabyblue}switch{cwhite} menu screens or select a tile at a {cbabyblue}different height{cwhite} during battle.
tutorial.Save: Press {cbabypink}F1{cwhite}/{cbabypink}F5{cwhite} to {cbabyblue}quick save{cwhite}/load (only when no menu is open).
tutorial.Debug: Press {cbabypink}[ESC]{cwhite} to open a {cbabyblue}debug window{cwhite} (only when no menu is open).
tutorial.Kill: Keep pressing {cbabypink}[K]{cwhite} during the change of turns in battle to automatically {cbabyblue}kill all enemies{cwhite}.
tutorial.Lose: Keep pressing {cbabypink}[L]{cwhite} during the change of turns in battle to automatically {cbabyblue}kill all allies{cwhite}.
